title: Fresh Lava Arrives at Ubinas Volcano
description: Located in the Andes, Ubinas is considered the most active volcano in Peru, with intermittent small to moderate eruptions recorded since 1550. It had been showing signs of an impending eruption since mid-2013, highlighted by the appearance of a fresh lava dome in March 2014.
